00139 #define arg_OPENATTR4 op->nfs_argop4_u.opopenattr
00140 #define res_OPENATTR4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.opopenattr
00141 
00142 int nfs4_op_openattr(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,   
00143                        compound_data_t   * data,
00144                        struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00145 {
00146   char            funcname[] = "nfs4_op_openattr" ;
00147   
00148   
00149   /* Lock are not supported */
00150   resp->resop = NFS4_OP_OPENATTR ;
00151   res_OPENATTR4.status =  NFS4ERR_NOTSUPP ;
00152   
00153   return res_OPENATTR4.status;
00154 } /* nfs4_op_openattr */
